name: HIMSS Immunization Integration Program CDC Test Plan v6.1
description: This test plan is to be used for the testing of the CDC EHR Immunization Related Requirements developed under Contract-No: 200-2014-60994 . All test cases are required to be executed. The test plan includes both functional and interoperability tests including Vaccine Update Notifications (HL7 V2.5.1 VXU/Z22) and Query and Response (Evaluated History and Forecast Group Z44/Z42). This version is updated for use in the 2018 test cycle. It is aligned with ONC 2015 Certification Criteria for § 170.315(f)(1) Transmission to Immunization Registries. This test plan is approved by ONC to demonstrate conformance to this criteria.
